statements: ALTER TABLE countries ADD COLUMN population INT DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE government_officials ADD COLUMN age INT;
ALTER TABLE government_officials MODIFY position VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE government.ministries ADD COLUMN established_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE government.agencies ADD COLUMN location STRING;
ALTER TABLE government.departments ADD COLUMN budget DECIMAL(10, 2);
ALTER TABLE government.departments ADD COLUMN location STRING NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE government.employees DROP COLUMN department_id;
ALTER TABLE government.projects ADD COLUMN start_date DATE NOT NULL;
